department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Replacing existing carpet flooring and base with new heavy traffic vinyl flooring and base.
description: The contract is for the RCMP Comox Detachment for  Flooring replacement.
full_summary:
# EZ899-240710 Phase 2 - RCMP Comox Valley Flooring Replacement
===============

## Overview
------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an invitation to qualify for the replacement of the flooring at the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Comox Valley Detachment.

## Contract Information
--------------------

*   **Reference Number:** WS4256106160
*   **Publication Date:** 14 November 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 29 November 2023 at 2:00 PM
*   **Contract Start Date:** 6 December 2023
*   **Contract End Date:** 31 March 2024

## Project Details
-----------------

This project involves the replacement of the existing carpet flooring and base with new heavy traffic vinyl flooring and base at the RCMP Comox Detachment.

## Eligibility and Requirements
-----------------------------

Eligible contractors must meet the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation document. The selection criteria is based on the lowest price.

## Contact Information
-----------------

*   **Name:** Allison, Rodnie (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** [rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Location:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## Trade Agreements
-----------------

This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity
-------------------------

Eligible contractors must be able to provide services in British Columbia.

## Contracting Entity
-------------------

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

## Langue du Projet
-------------------

English: Only.

## Procurement Method
-------------------

This is a competitive selective tendering procurement process.

## Notice
-----

This tender has been cancelled.  The vendor will be contacted directly to proceed with the Rebidding process. 神马,
